content.rendered:
An Android App Development Company to Put You Ahead of the Competition

In 2023, a staggering 3.3 billion users are part of the Android community, and we’re here to develop an Android app for you that will captivate all of them. 

Contact us

mobile

Tablet

Wear

TV

IoT

Start

We Create Android Apps That are Impressive and Dynamic

Being a leading Android app development company in Pune, we specialize in developing Android apps that are not only visually appealing but also dynamically responsive. We take user experience seriously, applying revolutionary UI/UX design concepts to create not just functional apps, but engaging experiences that drive customer retention.  Whether you want to increase engagement, optimise processes, or broaden your reach — our Android app development services can help you get to your goals quickly.

Android App Development Services We Offer

With years of experience in Android app development, we provide a comprehensive range of services adapted to your needs. We cover everything from responsive widget development to immersive game development and from custom mobile app development to Android consultation.

Contact us
Custom Android App Development

We can develop a customised Android app that is tailored to your unique needs. Our Android app developers are experts in developing custom Android solutions that not only address problems but also elevate your company, keeping it ahead of the competition in the mobile app environment.

Android UI/UX Designing

Our Android UI/UX design service is your ticket to visually appealing designs and user interfaces. We employ advanced UI/UX principles to create immersive experiences that engage people, increase user retention, and propel your company ahead.

AI/Machine Learning Apps Development for Android

You can unlock the potential of AI and machine learning for your Android app. To drive success, we empower organisations with sophisticated, data-driven Android applications that solve complicated challenges and improve user experiences.

Android Widget Development

With us, you can improve the functionality of your Android app. Our professional developers can create customised widgets that increase user involvement and simplify interactions, resulting in increased user satisfaction

Android Game Development

With our Android Game Development service, you can get compelling entertainment alternatives. Our skilled team transforms your gaming vision into a reality, creating realistic & enjoyable experiences that captivate your audience.

Kotlin Android App Development

Our Android app developers use the power of this versatile language to create strong and efficient Android applications that solve your complicated problems and drive company success.

Android App Re-engineering

We specialise in re-engineering your applications for Android success, leveraging our knowledge to tackle complicated obstacles and optimise performance. We can also assist you with Android app upgrades and migration.

Android App Testing & QA

We believe that testing & QA are the foundations of dependability, ensuring that your app runs smoothly. We apply rigorous testing procedures to discover and resolve any issues, guaranteeing that your app provides a flawless user experience and helps your business prosper.

Android TV App Development

With our Android TV App Development service, you may explore a new level of Android app development by leveraging the latest Android 13 capabilities. We’re here to help you redefine your company’s digital presence by creating immersive TV experiences that engage and fascinate your audience, keeping you at the cutting edge of entertainment technology.

Android Tablet App Development

Our developers can create powerful applications that optimise user experiences on larger screens, allowing you to smoothly enter new markets and boost productivity. With our help, you can unlock the full power of Android tablets.

Android Wear App Development

We’re at the forefront of creating novel Wearable experiences — all thanks to our Android app development team. We help organisations tap into the world of wearable technology, improving accessibility and involvement of users in this ever-changing digital ecosystem.

Android App Consultation

Our Android app counselling services will guide you through the difficult landscape of app development. To ensure a successful Android app journey, we offer assistance and solutions that align with your company’s goals.

Android App Support & Maintenance

Once your app is launched, we ensure that your Android app remains at its best through proactive monitoring and quick issue resolution, giving your business constant, trouble-free functioning and satisfied users.

Our Process

Ideating & Planning

Comprehensive market research and competitive analysis.

Making wireframes and prototypes to help visualise app concepts.

Planning features, functionalities, and development milestones

Choosing the appropriate technological stack and development tools.

UI/UX Designing

Selecting a User-Centered Interface Design

Choosing aesthetically pleasing and responsive layouts

Increasing the efficiency of user flows

Keeping Consistent Design Elements

Implementing the best UI/UX principles

Development & Testing

Agile development approaches for quick progress.

Precision coding for your app by skilled developers.

Quality is ensured through continuous testing and development.

Comprehensive device compatibility testing.

Strict security checks to safeguard your software. 

Deployment

Testing the Android app extensively on a variety of devices.

Ensuring that the app satisfies all required security and performance standards.

Optimizing the app’s listing for the Google Play Store to enhance visibility.

Assisting with the Play Store submission process.

Post-Launch Support & Maintenance

Continuous monitoring for potential problems

Regular updates to resolve issues

Optimisation of performance for smooth functioning

Bug fixes and security upgrades

Our Tech Stack

We are an Android app development firm that uses cutting-edge tools and technology. This helps us to create robust apps in a timely and efficient manner.  Our commitment to staying up-to-date ensures that your projects benefit from innovative advancements in the tech world.

Frameworks

  • Ionic
  • Xamarin
  • Flutter
  • React Native
  • Phone Gap
  • jQuery Mobile
  • Onsen UI

Libraries

  • Firebase
  • Jetpack components
  • Retrofit 2.0
  • Dagger
  • Picasso
  • Glide
  • CAMView

Programming Languages

  • Java
  • Kotlin
  • C#

ORM

  • Realm
  • TypeORM

Databases

  • Realm
  • MongoDB
  • MySQL
  • Room

Testing

  • Testcomplete
  • Appium
  • Robotium
  • Kobiton
  • Android Studio

Types of Apps We Develop

We specialize in developing various types of Android apps, including robust business applications and engaging consumer-focused apps. We cater solutions to various business types, (including B2B, B2E, and B2C), to ensure complete solutions for everyone.

Messenger

Utility

Gaming

News

Productivity

Lifestyle

Navigation

Social
Networking

Communication

Banking

Telehealth

Finance

Dating

Booking

Education

Delivery

E-commerce

Entertainment

Industries We Serve

As an Android app development company, we serve a wide range of sectors, providing customized solutions that meet the specific demands of each. Our experience spans many years in providing mobile app solutions to various industries.

Healthcare

We create Android apps that provide healthcare professionals with efficient patient management and telemedicine solutions.

Entertainment

Our Android app developers bring interactive and engaging experiences to users for a greater entertainment experience.

Real Estate

We provide Android applications that make the process of property searches simple and transactions easy.

E-commerce

With us, E-commerce businesses benefit from Android apps that boost online shopping convenience.

Banking & Finance

Our Android apps in banking and finance ensure secure and efficient financial transactions for everyone.

Travel & Hospitality

Our Android applications enhance the travel and hospitality industries by offering booking tools, guest services, and travel management resources.

Education

We assist educators with Android apps for interactive and efficient e-learning experiences.

Manufacturing

We serve the manufacturing industry by improving the supply chain, automating processes, and increasing industrial efficiency.

Why choose us?

With years of experience in Android app development, we provide a comprehensive range of services adapted to your needs.

100% Privacy

When you choose us for Android app development, you can count on Complete Confidentiality & security of your project

Agile Development Practices

Our agile development practices ensure that high-quality apps that fit your specific needs are developed.

Personalized Solution

We recognise that every organisation has different needs, thus we provide personalised Android app solutions that are tailored to your unique requirements.

Cost-Effective Development

Our Android app development services are cost-effective, ensuring that you get the most out of your investment.

Experienced Android Developers

With a staff of skilled Android developers with years of experience under their belt, we offer expertise that ensures outstanding app development.

Fast Turnaround time

We prioritise quick turnaround times, ensuring that your Android app is delivered on schedule without compromising quality.

Check out our engagement models

Learn More

Are you ready to augment your team with Android experts?

Contact us

Hire our Android developers

Hire Android developers for staff augmentation has several advantages for your project.  With our developers on board, you can accelerate project delivery and meet deadlines efficiently. Our Android developers are highly skilled, with an understanding of the most recent tools and technologies. Furthermore, we offer flexible engagement models that are adapted to your project demands, ensuring a smooth fit for your needs.

  • Java and Kotlin Proficiency: Expertise in the key Android programming languages.
  • Android SDK Mastery: In-depth knowledge of the Android SDK and related tools.
  • UI/UX Design Skills: Experience in creating user-friendly and attractive interfaces.
  • RESTful API Integration: Ability to Effortlessly integrate third-party applications and databases.
  • Problem Solving: Strong analytical skills to solve complex challenges.
  • Cross-Platform Development: Ability to create multi-platform apps using Flutter and React Native

Want to Explore More Options?

Check out our other mobile app development services that match your needs

Contact us

Android App Development

React Native App Development

Flutter App Development

iOS App
Development

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

Great Company This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali

Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian

Dilip Joshi

AVP - IT & Engineering at Shemaroo Entertainment Ltd

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G.

CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian's delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there's any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution

Vinay Darp

CEO at XtentTeam LLP

Latest Updates from Our Experts

Case Studies

View all case studies

Seventh Generation

June 13, 2024

Indy Build: Case Study of platform for Artists and Fans

April 30, 2024

Shemaroo Bhakti: devotional Mobile App Case Study

April 22, 2024

Android App Development FAQs

Have a question? We are here to answer.

Contact Us
I have a unique app Idea. How can you help me with that?

We’d love to help bring your unique app idea to life! To protect your idea, we’ll gladly sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). Our experienced team will work closely with you through every step of development, from concept to launch, ensuring your vision becomes a reality.

How do you maintain the confidentiality of the project?

We always prioritize the security of your project. Our team signs non-disclosure agreements (NDAs) to ensure your project’s confidentiality.

Do you assist in Play Store submissions?

We’d be delighted to assist you in developing your unique app concept! We will gladly sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) to protect your invention. Once formalities are completed, our experienced team will work directly with you to ensure that your vision becomes a reality.

Do you offer support after the app launch?

We provide extensive support following the launch of your app, ensuring that it functions properly, addressing bugs, and providing updates and additions.

How much does it cost to make an Android App?

Android app development costs vary greatly depending on project complexity, team size, app type, features implemented, and other factors. Please contact us for a customised quote.

Can I hire your team for my projects?

Absolutely! You can employ our experienced Android developers for your projects and benefit from their knowledge and experience.

How much time to create Android App?

The time it takes to develop an Android app is determined by its complexity. During the consultation, we will give you a project-specific timetable.
